key_metrics.name: Worldwide paid units growth
key_metrics.context: Strong unit growth across all regions

key_metrics.name: Prime same/next day deliveries
key_metrics.context: More than 9 billion items delivered same or next day to Prime members

sector_specific.prime_delivery_performance: more than 9 billion items delivered same or next day

guidance.commentary: AWS is growing at a pace we haven't seen since 2022, re-accelerating to 20.2% YoY. Financial focus is on long-term, sustainable growth in free cash flow.

acquisitions.name: Anthropic
acquisitions.details: Investments in convertible notes with upward adjustment for observable changes in price

partnerships.details: Signed new AWS agreements with Delta Air Lines, Volkswagen Group, Fox Corporation, ServiceNow, and others

product_launches.details: Massive AI compute cluster with nearly 500,000 Trainium2 chips
product_launches.impact: Enables building and deployment of Anthropic's Claude AI models
Designed for training and deploying the largest AI models

product_launches.details: Family of foundation models for AI with lower latency and pricing
product_launches.impact: Enhances Amazon Bedrock AI platform capabilities

product_launches.details: New shopping experience in U.S. app with ultra-low prices
product_launches.impact: Expands customer shopping options and market reach

initiatives.expected_impact: Expand access to education and skills training for at least 50 million people

initiatives.progress: Increased spending on AI and cloud infrastructure
initiatives.expected_impact: Support AWS business growth and AI capabilities

risks.details: $2.5 billion charge related to FTC settlement
$1.8 billion charge for planned role eliminations
Exposure to foreign exchange rate fluctuations
Potential for system interruptions and data breaches
risks.mitigation: Investment in security measures and redundancy systems

competitive_advantages: Leadership in AI and cloud services

key_positives: AWS re-accelerated to 20% growth, fastest pace since 2022
Net income surged 38% year-over-year to $21.2 billion
Strong cash generation with $14.8 billion in free cash flow
Heavy investment in AI infrastructure positioning for future growth
key_concerns: Significant one-time charges of $4.3 billion from FTC settlement and severance costs

notable_quotes.speaker: Andy Jassy, President and CEO
notable_quotes.quote: AWS is growing at a pace we haven't seen since 2022, re-accelerating to 20.2% YoY.

notable_quotes.speaker: Management
notable_quotes.quote: Our financial focus is on long-term, sustainable growth in free cash flow.

highlights.investment_thesis: Amazon delivered strong Q3 2025 results with accelerating AWS growth and robust cash generation, while making significant AI infrastructure investments. Despite one-time charges, the company demonstrates strong operational momentum across all segments with particular strength in cloud services and international markets.

metadata.notes: Comprehensive financial and operational data available. Missing some traditional metrics like gross profit and EPS, but strong coverage of segment performance and strategic initiatives.
